product_name: OllyDog Flinger Flying Disc Dog Toy - Small - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Providing instant fun at the beach, park or campground, the colorful Flinger Flying Disc Dog Toy from OllyDog is easy to throw-and easy for your dog to catch. 7-in. disc has 3-layer construction for durability. Soft rim is easy on your dog's mouth. Floats in water. Easy for a dog to pick up disc is flat on the ground. Closeout.
short_description: Providing instant fun at the beach, park or campground, the colorful Flinger Flying Disc Dog Toy from OllyDog is easy to throw-and easy for your dog to catch.
